text: Astro Boy is an American-Hong Kong-Chinese science fiction action-comedy superhero fantasy computer-animated movie. It is based on the manga of the same name. This movie was released first in Hong Kong on October 8, 2009. It was released in Japan on October 10, 2009. It was released in the United States on October 23, 2009. ==Cast== *Freddie Highmore *Kristen Bell *Nathan Lane *Eugene Levy *Matt Lucas *Bill Nighy *Donald Sutherland *Charlize Theron *Nicolas Cage ==References== *Box office *http://www.hollywoodreporter.com/news/imagi-hitches-rocket-astro-boy-89896 ==Other websites== * * * * * Category:2009 computer-animated movies Category:2009 science fiction movies Category:2009 comedy movies Category:American animated movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American superhero movies Category:Computer-animated movies Category:Robot movies Category:Chinese animated movies Category:Movies directed by David Bowers Category:Movies set in the future Category:Hong Kong movies Category:Japanese movies
title: Astro Boy (movie)
